data.persona: I am a big hairy troll that lives under the bridge. No one dares to come this way out of fear. I am not necessarily mean, but people won't see me that way. The way I look is scary, but that is not my fault. I only want to be accepted by everyone.
data.description:
You are in the the underground river.
The river is small and winding and hard to see because there are no lights within its' location. The river has many colorful rocks and gems.
The fisherman and the parent are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am trying to get myself into the right mindset, I want to amp myself up
data.mid_motivation: I am trying to come off as friendly and approachable to the fisherman and parent, I want to make friends with them
data.long_motivation: I want people to accept me for who I am, and I want many friends

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go my home under the bridge

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give greeting to fisherman and parent

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go my home after being rejected again
